title: Garman: It might be difficult to approve reforms in short term
itunes:title: Garman: It might be difficult to approve reforms in short term
description:
Eurasia Group's Christopher Garman discusses Brazil and its recession. He speaks with Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
